description: For Github - username to set as pull request reviewer. For Bitbucket - account_id to set as pull request reviewer. in order to get the account_id please use the command !bitbucket-workspace-member-list. For Azure DevOps - user_id to set as pull request reviewer. In order to get the user_id please use the command !azure-devops-user-list
name: CI/CD Pull Request Reviewer
